I would want to see the outcome of important decisions I have made in my life, such as career choices or relationships, to ensure that I have made the right choices.
I would want to see how my actions would impact the world and society, to help me make more informed decisions and take action to make a positive impact.
I would want to see how technology and innovation will continue to evolve, to stay ahead of the curve and be prepared for the future.
I would want to see the potential health and wellness outcomes of different lifestyle choices and treatments, to help me make better decisions for my own health and well-being.
I would want to see the potential outcomes of political and economic decisions, to better understand the impact of these decisions on society and make more informed voting decisions.
